post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Contract Programmer

  Nacan Products Limited is a leading manufacturer of adhesives, resins, and specialty starch products, operating across Canada. We are currently seeking a qualified Programmer to work on our ERP system (BPCS 6.x series) as a full-time contract employee.

The successful candidate will possess the following:

1. AS400/ I-SERIES Skill Set: RPGIV, RPGILE, BPCS ASSET, SQL, CLP, DFU, SDA, Working knowledge of AS\\\\400 commands, Sub-file, Interactive and Batch programming.

2. PC Skill Set: Word, Excel, Visual Basic, Lotus Notes

3. BPCS Skill Set: BPCS 6.x, Supply Chain Management Module: Order Entry, Billing, Finished Goods Inventory, Shipping, Outbound Logistics, parts of Accounts Receivable and Sales Reporting.

4. Ability to interact with process owners and users in an open and flexible fashion, communicating in a clear and concise manner.

Please address all correspondence to Linda Hayes, Human Resources, quoting reference: 02-03LH


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Contract
Ref Code: 02-03LH  

Contact Information
Linda Hayes
linda.hayes@nstarch.com
Nacan Products Limited
60 West Drive
Brampton ON L6S 5Y4
Fax: 905-796-1450
post.title: Contract Programmer
